title: Something I noticed when dragon dies
body:
It might just be me, but every time dragon dies and if I'm looking at the area dragon dies (and have vision), at the end of the death sound effect of the dragon, I hear a faint sound that resembles the sound fizz{{champion:105}}  makes when he uses his playful/trickster.

The sound is very faint and the sound effect doesn't include the splash at the end, just the sound he makes when he activates the ability

Might just be me hallucinating but idk, there is never a fizz in the game when this happens, but just gonna put it here cause I feel uneasy lol

replies.body: Disclaimer: Do you also see Arcade Hecarim in real life?

I just hear their normal death sounds, very clearly and normally, like the fog wasn't there. Dragon and Baron alike.
...i thought everyone had it.

> [{quoted}](name=Ediwir,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=4EyubWsE,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-07-09T10:11:29.254+0000)
>
> I just hear their normal death sounds, very clearly and normally, like the fog wasn't there. Dragon and Baron alike.
> ...i thought everyone had it.

same I hear the dragon die with or with out vision clearly when the enemy take it or my team I thought it was normal ;P

Hello gala

I hear the noise, then i question myself and go, wait, this game has a fizz?

then sure enough there is a fizz farming krugs at top lane, so i kill him
